QuestData.Title: Hungry as an Ogre!
QuestData.Description: You meet some people out here sometime. Nice people. Met an ogre once. Ogres get hungry just like me.$B$BI'll never forget what he said. He said "Mud big ogre. Me hungry. Go bash fishy. Bring Mud food. You feed Mud or Mud eat you."$B$BSo I got him those fish and he ate 'em up. That's when I started too. The heads are the best part, all soggy-like.$B$BDon't crush those heads now. It makes them sad. Sad heads aren't good eating. Get me happy heads and I'll eat them and be happy too.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 8 Mirefin Heads from Mirefin Murlocs.
QuestData.CompletionText: Jarl's hungry. Just like that ogre.
QuestData.RewardText: Wonder what it's like to be an ogre. Big people have to eat more.$B$BOgres must be even hungrier than me. That doesn't sound very fun.
